model.classes

Class DestinationCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.classes.Card
      • model.classes.PointCard
        • model.classes.DestinationCard

  • public class DestinationCard
extends PointCard
    CS252 Object-Oriented Programming
    DestinationCard Class. Represents a Destination card that can be purchased with TrainCards. The cost is placed in the colors array.
    Author:
    George Kokiadis csd3962@csd.uoc.gr

        Parameters:
        owner - Player that owns the card
        image - Sprite for the card
        points - Points this card represents
        id - unique card ID
        from - Where the trip starts
        to - Where the trip ends
        colors - Colors required to purchase the card
